Genre.label: REAL_IMAGE
Genre.Description: Real images are images that are unaltered, cumulative interpretations of photons hitting a detector plate. These images are not suspected to have been altered in any way, have not been passed through filters and were not created from scratch and should be natural images.

Genre.label: FABRICATED_IMAGE
Genre.Description: Fabricated images are images that were created from scratch, likely distributions that are skewed heavily in favor of a lower number of colors will result in this being triggered. For instance a black and white image with no major color variance (and large color localities) may trigger this.
